senses.de: Knowing that something exists, or having knowledge or experience of a particular thing.
senses.ex: She was aware of the man's presence.

Tips.title: Perception Awareness
Tips.description: Focus on awareness through senses and thoughts, not just general knowledge.
Tips.example: I was aware of the faint music from upstairs.

Tips.title: Partial Knowledge
Tips.description: Use 'aware' when you have some knowledge, but maybe not all details.
Tips.example: She's aware of the basics, but not the specifics.

senses.de: Used to describe people who understand that there are things which they do not know about a particular subject or situation.
senses.ex: We need to make students more politically aware.

Tips.title: Subject Specific
Tips.description: Mention 'aware' when acknowledging gaps in knowledge about a specific topic.
Tips.example: I am aware that there are many theories I've yet to learn.

Tips.title: Aware of Ignorance
Tips.description: Shows humility and recognition of one's own limitations in understanding.
Tips.example: I'm aware I don't fully understand quantum mechanics.

senses.de: Mindful, concerned about and well-informed in a particular situation or development.
senses.ex: As an ecologically aware company, we use only biodegradable materials in our products.

Tips.title: Issue Awareness
Tips.description: Implies special attention or focus on particular issues or concerns.
Tips.example: They are acutely aware of the endangered species.

Tips.title: Action-Oriented
Tips.description: Highlights ongoing concern rather than passive knowledge.
Tips.example: The council is aware of the housing crisis and is acting.

Tips.title: Conscious Choice
Tips.description: Suggests deliberate efforts to stay informed or considerate.
Tips.example: As a consumer, she's very aware of product sustainability.

Alert.wordDefinition:
Alert means being prepared and ready to respond quickly to any potential danger or threat. This is applicable in situations where there is an immediate danger or risk, such as during a fire or if you are crossing a busy street.

In simpler terms, being alert means being quick to react to danger, while being aware means being knowledgeable and informed about what is happening around you.

Attentive.wordDefinition:
Attentive refers to someone who is paying close attention to something or someone. This could involve actively listening or observing, and being aware of details or changes in the situation.

Attentiveness is useful in situations where focus and concentration are needed, such as in school or at work.

Attentive is about paying close attention to what is happening in the present moment, while aware is about having knowledge and understanding of a subject or situation.

Cognizant.wordDefinition:
However, aware is more commonly used to describe a general understanding or consciousness of something, while cognizant implies a deeper and more deliberate understanding.

If you are cognizant of the fact that it's going to rain, it means you have thought about how the rain will affect your plans and are prepared for it.

Aware is more informal and commonly used, while cognizant is more formal and used in professional or legal settings.

Conscious.wordDefinition:
The words aware and conscious both mean having knowledge or perception of something, but they are used in different ways.

Conscious means being aware of your own existence and surroundings, as well as your thoughts, feelings, and actions. For example, you may be conscious of your breathing and heartbeat, as well as the thoughts and emotions you are experiencing.

Aware is more commonly used to describe having knowledge or understanding of something external to oneself, while conscious is more commonly used to describe being aware of one's own existence and internal experiences.

Inform.wordDefinition:
Inform means providing someone with knowledge or information about something.

It describes when someone shares or gives information to another person. For example, "I will inform you of the test tomorrow.".

Aware is about having knowledge while inform is about sharing knowledge with someone else.

Knowledgeable.wordDefinition:
Aware means that you have some basic understanding or recognition of something, while the word knowledgeable means that you have a deep understanding or expertise in something.

For example, if you are aware of a new law, it means that you know of its existence, but if you are knowledgeable about the same law, it means that you know all its details and implications.

Aware is applicable in situations where you need a basic understanding of something, while knowledgeable is applicable in situations where you require an expert-level understanding.

Mindful.wordDefinition:
Awareness refers to having knowledge, recognition or understanding of something. Mindfulness means being present and fully engaged in the current moment, with a nonjudgmental attitude.

If you are mindful of your surroundings, you are actively engaged and focused on what is happening around you without any distractions.

Awareness is applicable when you need to know, recognize or understand something. Mindfulness is useful when you want to engage in the moment, be more present, and have a clear mind.

The difference between the two is that awareness refers to knowledge or understanding, while mindfulness is about being present and fully engaged in the moment.

Observant.wordDefinition:
The difference between aware and observant is that aware means you know or understand something while observant means you pay close attention and notice details.

Observant is applicable when someone is actively noticing details in their surroundings. For example, "The detective was very observant and noticed a small detail that helped solve the case.".

In simpler terms, aware means you know something while observant means you're paying attention to your surroundings.

Perceptive.wordDefinition:
Perceptive means being able to understand or notice things quickly and accurately. It relates to being able to see beyond the obvious and comprehend a deeper level of meaning.

However, if you are perceptive, you might notice that the rain has a certain smell, that birds are hiding under trees, and that the sound of raindrops is different on different surfaces.

In general, awareness is more straightforward and refers to the knowledge of a particular fact or situation, while being perceptive requires a deeper level of observation and analysis.

quotes.Text: I remember a specific moment, watching my grandmother hang the clothes on the line, and her saying to me, 'you are going to have to learn to do this,' and me being in that space of awareness and knowing that my life would not be the same as my grandmother's life.
quotes.Title: American Entertainer
quotes.Name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.Text: Any 'artist' makes a living by expressing what others can't - because they're unaware of their feelings, they're too afraid to express those feelings, or they lack the skills to communicate and be understood.
quotes.Title: American Novelist
quotes.Name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.Text: Being more aware creates responsibility. What does responsibility mean? It means the ability to respond. The more conscious you are in your ability to respond, the more creative you'll be.
quotes.Title: American Speaker
quotes.Name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.Text: I'm never going to be one of those guys who gets on TV and yells and screams. That's not how I do my business. But I'm very aware of social responsibility.
quotes.Title: American Baseball Player
quotes.Name: Charles Barkley

quotes.Text: People need to be made more aware of the need to work at learning how to live because life is so quick and sometimes it goes away too quickly.
quotes.Title: American Artist
quotes.Name: Andy Warhol

quotes.Text: I'm very aware and very conscious of the path I chose in life, and very aware of the path I didn't choose.
quotes.Title: American Singer
quotes.Name: Taylor Swift

quotes.Text: Raising awareness on the most pressing environmental issues of our time is more important than ever.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.Text: I've studied my culture deeply and I'm very aware of my tradition.
quotes.Title: Nigerian Musician
quotes.Name: Fela Kuti

quotes.Text: I like to encourage people and create awareness about fitness.
quotes.Title: Indian Actor
quotes.Name: Gurmeet Choudhary

quotes.Text: I was always deeply aware that I was living in history.
quotes.Title: American Celebrity
quotes.Name: Chelsea Clinton
